DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether extracorporeal shock wave therapy ( ESWT ) effective treatment erectile dysfunction .
DOC.brief_title: Low-energy Linear Extracorporal Shock Wave Therapy Erectile Dysfunction .
DOC.detailed_description: Erectile dysfunction negative impact quality life relationship . Thirty sixty- five percent men 40 year age erection disorder . Current challenge medical treatment meet high cost risk side effect . Emerging new therapy low-energy shock wave stimulate production endothelial growth factor nitrogen oxide result angiogenesis . It aim assess efficaciousness method potential improve erectile dysfunction . We propose prospective double-blind , randomise , cross-over , sham-controlled trial , assess effective shock wave therapy erectile dysfunction . Patients receive one treatment per week ten week . Subjects follow one year treatment . Standardized questionnaire assess study endpoint erectile dysfunction . We hypothesize shock wave therapy could represent low cost , low risk treatment erectile dysfunction men .
DOC.criteria: Erectile dysfunction least 6 month In relationship Patient accept use therapy erectile dysfunction Prostatectomy Radiotherapy pelvis Hormonal therapy prostate cancer Anatomical penis disorder Penile prosthesis Treatment anticoagulant ( except acetylsalicylic acid 75 mg ) Psychiatric disorder Hypogonadism IIEF score high 25 Pregnant partner og deliver within last 12 month Critical health disease Neurological disorder
